--------------------
Text: Color Rhapsodies was a series of usually one-shot animated cartoon shorts produced by Charles Mintz for Columbia Pictures.
Triplets:<Charles Mintz
1:
--------------------
Text: Color Rhapsodies:  They were launched in 1934, following the phenomenal success of Walt Disney's Technicolor "Silly Symphonies".
Triplets:<Color Rhapsodies
2:
--------------------
Text: Color Rhapsodies:  Because of Disney's exclusive rights to the full three strip Technicolor process, "Color Rhapsodies" were produced in the older two-tone Technicolor process until 1935, when Disney's exclusive contract expired.

Triplets:<Color Rhapsodies
